sentence.Network_en: Your Cincpac building is boiling like an anthill, I saw that!
sentence.Network_cn: 你的太平洋舰队总司令部忙得象蚁山一样沸沸扬扬, 这我亲眼看见 啦 !

sentence.Network_en: The anthill is well built that even the heaviest storm will not destroy it.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个蚁冢堆得好极了,就是最大的风暴也破坏不了它.

sentence.Network_en: You can see what's happening in the anthill clearly here.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里能够清楚地看到蚁垤里的情况.

entry.def: An anthill is a pile of earth formed by ants when they are making a nest.

means.word_mean: 1. a mound of earth made by ants as they dig their nest
